Title: Ashwathama
Writer: Vikram Chandra (original story), Varun Grover (script by)
Actors: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Saif Ali Khan, Elnaaz Norouzi, Kubra Sait
Plot: To prove his standing in the police force, police officer Sartaj Singh makes a chase around Mumbai City on receiving an anonymous tip-off from a mysterious stranger.
